      - shinylive-sw.js

```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true
#| components: [editor, viewer]
#| layout: vertical
#| viewerHeight: 400
## file: app.R
library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Hello Shiny!"),
  verbatimTextOutput(outputId = "dataVariables")
)

server <- function(input, output) {

  output$dataVariables <- renderPrint({
      ds <- read.csv("fruit.csv")
      ds
  })

}

# Create Shiny app ----
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)

## file: fruit.csv
id,name,count
1,"apple",20
2,"orange",12
3,"grape",100
```
